com.arcrobotics.ftclib.gamepad

Class ButtonReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arcrobotics.ftclib.gamepad.ButtonReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ToggleButtonReader

    public class ButtonReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements KeyReader
    Class that reads the value of button states. In order to get any values that depend on the previous state, you must call "readValue();" in a loop.
